name: Mr. Robot
summary: Mr. Robot follows Elliot, a young programmer who works as a cyber-security engineer by day and as a vigilante hacker by night. Elliot finds himself at a crossroads when the mysterious leader of an underground hacker group recruits him to destroy the firm he is paid to protect. Compelled by his personal beliefs, Elliot struggles to resist the chance to take down the multinational CEOs he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

episodes.name: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
episodes.summary: In MR. ROBOT, Elliot, a cyber-security engineer by day and vigilante hacker by night, is recruited by a mysterious underground group to destroy the firm he's paid to protect. Elliot must decide how far he'll go to expose the forces he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

episodes.name: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
episodes.summary: Tyrell Wellick, now Evil Corp's acting CTO since Elliot helped get Terry Colby arrested, makes Elliot an offer he can (and does) refuse: a position as Evil Corp's head of Cyber Security and a big bank account to match. By saying no, has Elliot made himself a mark for Wellick?

episodes.name: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
episodes.summary: After being shoved off the railing in Coney Island by Mr. Robot, Elliot wakes up in a hospital room, badly banged up. Krista, his psychiatrist, is inclined to send him to rehab unless he's willing to be regularly drug tested. Elliot complies, knowing that he can easily change the hospital records for the tests since he hacked their system long ago.

episodes.name: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
episodes.summary: At fsociety, Elliot lays out his plan to hack Steel Mountain's climate control system and raise the heat high enough to melt all the tapes that record the data. Romero points out the plan's many flaws but when Elliot remembers that they only have a few days left before Evil Corp switches over to their new redundant security protocols based on what Tyrell Wellick told him, they reluctantly agree it's now or never.

episodes.name: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
episodes.summary: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America.

episodes.name: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
episodes.summary: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's "game" gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

episodes.name: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
episodes.summary: Elliott goes missing; Mr. Robot tries to pull fsociety back together; Angela goes head-to-head with an old nemesis.

episodes.name: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
episodes.summary: Allsafe is controlled; the Dark Army is ready to meet Elliot; and Tyrell and Joanna's plan goes into effect.

episodes.name: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
episodes.summary: The Evil Corp hack is threatened by a mystery man from Elliot's past.

episodes.name: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
episodes.summary: In the Season 1 finale, Mr. Robot and Tyrell are MIA; and a past hack haunts Elliot.

episodes.name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt1.tc
episodes.summary: one month later and omfg, five/nine changed the world. elliot in seclusion. darlene takes the lead. fsociety delivers malicious payload. TANGO DOWN? tbc.

episodes.name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt2.tc
episodes.summary: angela happy at evil corp. tyrell MIA and joanna has a new bf? wtf? dom leads fbi investigation into five/nine. elliot demands answers from mr. robot.

episodes.name: eps2.1_k3rnel-pan1c.ksd
episodes.summary: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot but it ain't easy, smh. Angela sees behind the scenes at Evil Corp. Sh*t hits fan with fsociety.

episodes.name: eps2.2_init1.asec
episodes.summary: Elliot friends Ray, who he hopes can help delete Mr. Robot; Dom makes a major discovery; and Darlene questions whether the FBI or Dark Army is the bigger threat.

episodes.name: eps2.3_logic-b0mb.hc
episodes.summary: Elliot can't quit the game; Dom and the FBI head to China to investigate 5/9; Joanna is haunted; and Darlene calls on Angela for help.

episodes.name: eps2.4_m4ster-s1ave.aes
episodes.summary: Mr. Robot tries to show Elliot that he can be useful; and Darlene and Angela's plan doesn't go as hoped.

episodes.name: eps2.5_h4ndshake.sme
episodes.summary: Mr. Robot and Elliot try to make nice; and Joanna is given an ultimatum.

episodes.name: eps2.6_succ3ss0r.p12
episodes.summary: A video is released by fsociety; Darlene decides to act on an old desire.

episodes.name: eps2.7_init5.fve
episodes.summary: Angela wants more from E Corp than they want to give; and Elliot and Darlene seek answers.

episodes.name: eps2.8_h1dden-pr0cess.axx
episodes.summary: Elliot wonders if Mr. Robot has been lying to him; Darlene attempts to do the right thing; Dom and the FBI get closer.

name: Better Call Saul
summary: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman became Walter White's lawyer. When we meet him, the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer searching for his destiny, and, more immediately, hustling to make ends meet. Working alongside, and often against, Jimmy is "fixer" Mike Ehrmantraut, a beloved character introduced in Breaking Bad. The series will track Jimmy's transformation into Saul Goodman, the man who puts "criminal" in "criminal lawyer.

episodes.name: Uno
episodes.summary: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

episodes.name: Mijo
episodes.summary: As his troubles escalate to a boiling point, Jimmy finds himself in dire straits. An act of carelessness puts Chuck at risk.

episodes.name: Nacho
episodes.summary: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that a dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.summary: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationship with a rival firm.

episodes.name: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.summary: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarming news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Five-O
episodes.summary: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Meanwhile, Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

episodes.name: Bingo
episodes.summary: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: Rico
episodes.summary: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

episodes.name: Pimento
episodes.summary: Chuck urges Jimmy to accept a harsh truth. Meanwhile, a deal threatens to go off the rails when Mike's ability to complete a job is called into question.

episodes.name: Marco
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of recent events, Jimmy seizes the opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Meanwhile, Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.name: Switch
episodes.summary: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.name: Cobbler
episodes.summary: Mike brokers a deal in order to keep a potentially messy situation intact; Jimmy tries to exonerate an eccentric client.

episodes.name: Amarillo
episodes.summary: Jimmy's client outreach efforts succeed, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship; Mike is puzzled by Stacey's upsetting news.

episodes.name: Gloves Off
episodes.summary: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Meanwhile, Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.name: Rebecca
episodes.summary: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Meanwhile, Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.name: Bali Ha'i
episodes.summary: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity; Kim receives a life-changing proposal; when he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.

episodes.name: Inflatable
episodes.summary: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced, but with Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

episodes.name: Fifi
episodes.summary: Mike is determined to settle the score with a dangerous adversary. An unexpected opportunity to gain a competitive edge falls in Jimmy's lap.

episodes.name: Nailed
episodes.summary: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

episodes.name: Klick
episodes.summary: Jimmy is forced to make a hard choice. Mike takes matters into his own hands. Hamlin relays shocking news while Chuck's condition continues to evolve.

episodes.name: Mabel
episodes.summary: Jimmy and Chuck's relationship deteriorates; Kim feels the pressure of running her own firm; Mike investigates the note left on his car.

episodes.name: Witness
episodes.summary: Jimmy and Kim hire an assistant; Mike seeks out a mysterious acquaintance; Chuck uses the law to gain an advantage over Jimmy.

episodes.name: Sunk Costs
episodes.summary: Jimmy decides to represent a new client to Kim's dismay; Mike meets a formidable ally who gives a tempting offer.

episodes.name: Sabrosito
episodes.summary: Jimmy asks a favor of Mike; new complications disrupt Salamancas' business; Chuck and Jimmy struggle with a compromise.

episodes.name: Chicanery
episodes.summary: Kim and Jimmy face off with an adversary; Jimmy looks to Chuck's past to secure his future; Jimmy loses an ally and gains another.

name: Homeland
summary: The winner of 6 Emmy Awards including Outstanding Drama Series, Homeland is an edge-of-your-seat sensation. Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody is both a decorated hero and a serious threat. CIA officer Carrie Mathison is tops in her field despite being bipolar. The delicate dance these two complex characters perform, built on lies, suspicion, and desire, is at the heart of this gripping, emotional thriller in which nothing short of the fate of our nation is at stake.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: In the opener of this "Manchurian Candidate"-like political thriller, a marine rescued after eight years as a POW in Afghanistan returns home a war hero. But a CIA operative suspects he may actually be an enemy agent with a connection to Al Qaeda and part of a plan to commit a terrorist act on U.S. soil.

episodes.name: Grace
episodes.summary: An undercover agent with connections to a Saudi prince who may be funding terrorist activities provides Carrie with a revealing bit of electronic evidence. Meanwhile, Carrie studies surveillance footage of life in Brody's home, where he appears troubled by traumatic memories and resists Pentagon and media pressure to be hyped as an American war hero.

episodes.name: Clean Skin
episodes.summary: An exclusive television interview will thrust the Brody family into the national spotlight, unless Dana pulls off her plan to sidetrack the whole bogus process. Elsewhere, Carrie and the team sniff out an Al Qaeda attack on American soil; and Carrie's embedded operative in Prince Farid's camp gets trapped in a chilling situation.

episodes.name: Semper I
episodes.summary: Political powers make big plans to promote Brody as a national hero, but erratic behavior on his part threatens his media image. Elsewhere, a desperate Carrie searches for evidence to link Brody with Abu Nazir, while Saul enjoins her to follow the terrorist financier's money trail.

episodes.name: Blind Spot
episodes.summary: Carrie believes her suspicions about Brody may be proven correct when he confronts the sole survivor of the insurgents who held him hostage. But the reunion ultimately raises more questions. Meanwhile, the agency zeros in on Aileen and Faisel, the lovers who used funds from the stolen jewelry to purchase the house near the airport.

episodes.name: The Good Soldier
episodes.summary: Having lost a number of essential personnel to Nazir's terrorist plot against the U.S., the CIA issue polygraph tests on everyone who had contact with them. This includes Brody, which Carrie hopes will reveal the truth about him.

episodes.name: The Weekend
episodes.summary: Carrie and Brody spend a weekend in the countryside, which ends up complicating their relationship further. Elsewhere, Jessica and Mike catch flak about the truth behind their relationship, while Saul catches Aileen hightailing it to Mexico.

episodes.name: Achilles Heel
episodes.summary: While Carrie and Saul are left reeling by the news that Walker is alive, the intelligence organisations squabble over how to capture him. The FBI leans toward using the public's help, but Carrie thinks they should use his family to draw him out. Elsewhere, Brody sets out to find a mysterious man who has surprising info about his years as a captive.

episodes.name: Crossfire
episodes.summary: Brody's efforts to sever ties with Abu Nazir triggers flashbacks to his time as a captive. Meanwhile, the mosque shooting results in a public-relations nightmare for Carrie.

episodes.name: Representative Brody
episodes.summary: Walker's Washington contact is identified by Carrie and Saul, but the target is protected via diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, political bigwigs approach Brody about running for a disgraced congressman's seat.

episodes.name: The Vest
episodes.summary: When the dust settles from an explosion, Saul finds a manic Carrie hospitalised and realises there may be merit to her wild theories. Meanwhile, with his congressional campaign set to kick off, Brody takes the family on a weekend getaway to Gettysburg, where he obtains an important item.

episodes.name: Marine One
episodes.summary: In the Season 1 finale, a near-catatonic Carrie is confined to bed as Saul puzzles over the unnerving implications of her time line. Elsewhere, Walker settles on a perch from which to complete his mission; and Brody preps for the vice president's policy summit.

episodes.name: The Smile
episodes.summary: In the Season 2 premiere, Brody learns he is the political "future of the party," and receives a tantalizing offer from the vice president, while a recovering Carrie receives a disturbing request from a surprising source. In Beirut, Saul gets involved in some cloak-and-dagger doings.

episodes.name: Beirut is Back
episodes.summary: Carrie reluctantly returns to Beirut and an operation that might possibly spell the end of Abu Nazir; back in Washington, Brody is pressed into service by his handler, and his relationship with Jessica deteriorates. Meanwhile, Capt. Mike Faber has questions about the shooting of Elizabeth Gaines.

episodes.name: State of Independence
episodes.summary: The results of Carrie's Beirut mission lead her to believe that she'll be rejoining the CIA; and Brody discovers that the bomb maker is on a watch list and in imminent danger of being caught. Meanwhile, Jessica steps into the political spotlight.

episodes.name: New Car Smell
episodes.summary: Estes green-lights a covert mission based on intelligence gleaned from Beirut, and picks his own trusted operative to lead it; and Brody is shocked to bump into Carrie at Langley. Meanwhile, Dana and the vice president's son appear to have something in common.

episodes.name: Q&A
episodes.summary: Estes green-lights a covert mission based on intelligence gleaned from Beirut, and picks his own trusted operative to lead it; and Brody is shocked to bump into Carrie at Langley. Meanwhile, Dana and the vice president's son appear to have something in common.

episodes.name: A Gettysburg Address
episodes.summary: Dana's visit to the hospital proves shocking; Faber's interest in Tom Walker piques the CIA's interest; Brody agrees to team with Carrie and Quinn to prevent an attack on the U.S., but his loyalty is called to the fore when Gettysburg once again becomes a focal point of a pivotal engagement.

episodes.name: The Clearing
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of the ambush, Carrie and the team scramble to gain control of the operation, while Brody attends a well-heeled fund-raiser at a Virginia horse farm. Elsewhere, Saul drops in on Aileen, who is in solitary confinement, hoping she can shed some light on the latest attack; and a conflicted Dana leans on Finn to fess up to their crime.

episodes.name: I'll Fly Away
episodes.summary: Brody's juggling of alliances appear to be leading him to a major meltdown, so Carrie, against Quinn's orders, stages a dicey intervention. Meanwhile, a conflicted Dana seeks comfort from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Two Hats
episodes.summary: Things for Brody are threatening to spiral out of control, forcing him to make a phone call he has been avoiding; Carrie preps for a pivotal meeting; Saul teams with Virgil and Max for an assignment.

episodes.name: Broken Hearts
episodes.summary: Brody and Walden develop a chink in their political relationship, and it may impact their future, while Dana and Finn come to an understanding concerning their differences. Meanwhile, Carrie discovers she's not as looped in as she thought.

episodes.name: In Memoriam
episodes.summary: Carrie's hunt for Nazir continues, but she suspects something's amiss inside the Agency, while interrogation reveals Roya's true colours. Meanwhile, unexpected circumstances put Saul's career in jeopardy

name: Silicon Valley
summary: In the high-tech gold rush of modern Silicon Valley, the people most qualified to succeed are the least capable of handling success. From Mike Judge comes this satire about a programmer whose game-changing algorithm becomes the subject of a valley-wide bidding war.

episodes.name: Minimum Viable Product
episodes.summary: Attending an elaborate launch party, Richard and his computer programmer friends - Big Head, Dinesh and Gilfoyle - dream of making it big. Instead, they're living in the communal Hacker Hostel owned by former programmer Erlich, who gets to claim ten percent of anything they invent there. When it becomes clear that Richard has developed a powerful compression algorithm for his website, Pied Piper, he finds himself courted by Gavin Belson, his egomaniacal corporate boss, who offers a $10 million buyout by his firm, Hooli. But Richard holds back when well-known investor Peter Gregory makes a counteroffer.

episodes.name: The Cap Table
episodes.summary: After a celebratory party at the Hacker Hostel, Richard and Erlich learn that Peter Gregory won't pay up until they deliver a viable business plan that includes a slimmed-downed staff. A desperate Richard hires former Belson underling Jared, and they set about trying to trim the fat. While Gilfoyle and Dinesh prove essential, Big Head's place in the company is less certain.

episodes.name: Articles of Incorporation
episodes.summary: While Gavin Belson begins to hype Nucleus, a competing compression platform, Richard learns that the name Pied Piper is already registered to a sprinkler company, forcing him to negotiate. Meanwhile, Erlich goes on a vision quest for a new company name, and Peter Gregory proves elusive when one of his companies asks for money.

episodes.name: Fiduciary Duties
episodes.summary: At Peter's toga party, Richard drunkenly promises to make Erlich a board member, which he regrets the next morning. After being unassigned at Hooli, Big Head finds others like him who have made careers out of doing nothing. Richard struggles to put Pied Piper's vision into words for a presentation without Erlich; later, he discovers an interesting connection between Peter and Gavin Belson.

episodes.name: Signaling Risk
episodes.summary: Erlich convinces a graffiti artist to create Pied Piper's logo, with controversial results. Jared tries to make the company more efficient. After Gavin Belson and Peter Gregory unexpectedly come face-to-face, Richard learns that he only has eight weeks to prepare for a live demo at TechCrunch Disrupt.

episodes.name: Third Party Insourcing
episodes.summary: Richard feels threatened when the team hires "The Carver", a hacker with a notorious reputation, to help with Pied Piper's cloud. Jared finds himself taken for a ride when he seeks out Peter Gregory's signature. Erlich and Dinesh compete for the attention of Tara, Gilfoyle's visiting girlfriend. Later, Dinesh faces a sexual dilemma.

episodes.name: Proof of Concept
episodes.summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt, Richard feels the pressure to finish his demo, but finds himself distracted by a girl he dated briefly, who's now spreading rumors about him. Jared worries that Monica is taking his place in the company. Dinesh develops a crush on a girl at a neighboring booth. Erlich's scandalous past connection to one of the judges threatens Pied Piper's chances.

episodes.name: Optimal Tip-to-Tip Efficiency
episodes.summary: Poised to compete at TechCrunch Disrupt, the guys of Pied Piper become worried after an impressive presentation by Gavin Belson. As Jared tries to pivot the company, Richard is inspired to make big changes at the last minute.

episodes.name: Sand Hill Shuffle
episodes.summary: Season 2 begins with the Pied Piper guys being wined and dined by every venture capitalist under the sun, while Monica adjusts to a new managing partner at Raviga as the company faces major changes.

episodes.name: Runaway Devaluation
episodes.summary: Pied Piper could go under if Richard and the guys can't find legal and financial help in the wake of Hooli's bombshell. Meanwhile, Dinesh tries to thwart a fund-raising campaign for his cousin's new app; and Monica tries to keep her interest in Pied Piper separate from her job.

episodes.name: Bad Money
episodes.summary: Richard mulls a proposal by Gavin, but also considers a pitch from Russ Hanneman about backing Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Monica learns surprising news about Richard's deal with Hooli; and Gilfoyle and Dinesh go to extremes to get what they want.

episodes.name: The Lady
episodes.summary: Richard butts heads with Erlich over a prospective hire, while Dinesh and Gilfoyle become suspicious that a new employee they recommended is commanding a higher salary. Big Head gets a surprising promotion at Hooli. At a board meeting, Monica and Richard find themselves outvoted; Jared institutes a workplace harassment policy.

episodes.name: Server Space
episodes.summary: Gavin creates interference that hinders Pied Piper's expansion. Meanwhile, the guys could be threatened by a nosy neighbor; Guilfoyle sets out to build servers; Richard's reluctant to let Jared move in; and Big Head's leadership skills are suspect.

episodes.name: Homicide
episodes.summary: Erlich runs into an old protégé who's now an energy drink billionaire when Monica urges the guys to pursue a livestream opportunity, but Richard learns their friendship isn't what Erlich thinks it is. Meanwhile, Jared wants Carla and Monica to be friends.

episodes.name: Adult Content
episodes.summary: The team fields job offers and Russ is distracted by financial news, but Richard realizes Pied Piper could fold if it doesn't merge with a hated rival. Meanwhile, Dinesh tries to woo a woman online; and Gavin looks on the bright side of Nucleus' failure.

episodes.name: White Hat/Black Hat
episodes.summary: Richard gets paranoid about security after he takes pity on a competitor and inadvertently starts a feud. Meanwhile, Jared fibs about Pied Piper's size; and Gavin looks for a scapegoat when he feels pressure from board members.

episodes.name: Binding Arbitration
episodes.summary: Erlich wants to testify when Pied Piper and Hooli enter binding arbitration, but Richard worries that his rival's claims could have merit. Meanwhile, Jared, Dinesh and Gilfoyle debate a philosophical theory; and Big Head gets a boost.

episodes.name: Two Days of the Condor
episodes.summary: As the guys await the verdict on Pied Piper's fate, an unexpected real-life drama draws a spike in traffic to their livestream and leaves them fighting to hold things together - literally. While Erlich considers his future, Richard scrambles to save Pied Piper's.

name: The Walking Dead
summary:
The Walking Dead tells the story of the months and years that follow after a zombie apocalypse. It follows a group of survivors, led by former police officer Rick Grimes, who travel in search of a safe and secure home. As the world overrun by the dead takes its toll on the survivors, their interpersonal conflicts present a greater danger to their continuing survival than the walkers that roam the country. Over time, the characters are changed by the constant exposure to death and some grow willing to do anything to survive.

Based on the comic book series of the same name by Robert Kirkman, Tony Moore, and Charlie Adlard.

episodes.name: Days Gone Bye
episodes.summary: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane, whom he meets along the way, help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

episodes.name: Guts
episodes.summary: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers. The group dynamic devolves from accusations to violence, as Rick must confront an enemy far more dangerous than the undead.

episodes.name: Tell It to the Frogs
episodes.summary: Rick makes a decision to go back to Atlanta to retrieve the bag of guns and save a man's life. Lori and Shane must deal with the surprising return of someone they thought was dead.

episodes.name: Vatos
episodes.summary: Rick's mission to Atlanta is jeopardized when things go awry. Jim becomes unhinged in camp.

episodes.name: Wildfire
episodes.summary: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision

episodes.name: TS-19
episodes.summary: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.

episodes.name: What Lies Ahead
episodes.summary: After the CDC explosion, the survivors are still on the move when they encounter a herd of walkers that separates one of their own, leading them to a possible safe haven.

episodes.name: Bloodletting
episodes.summary: Coming to the aid of another, Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get badly needed medical supplies.

episodes.name: Save the Last One
episodes.summary: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

episodes.name: Cherokee Rose
episodes.summary: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice which leads to unusual behavior and self-distancing. The rest of the group tries to hang on somewhere between living to die and dying to live.

episodes.name: Chupacabra
episodes.summary: Glenn, the only one breaking barriers between both groups, knows far too much for his comfort level. Daryl finds a sign of life and, in his delirium, tries to make it back to the farm alive.

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.summary: Secrets are told and secrets are revealed. Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world’s new reality. Andrea comes out of her shell. Everyone is becoming more and more aware that “everything is food for something.”

episodes.name: Pretty Much Dead Already
episodes.summary: Hershel sets a deadline. All secrets are out in the open. Glenn stands up for himself and Shane takes charge.

episodes.name: Nebraska
episodes.summary: Rick and the others try to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.

episodes.name: Triggerfinger
episodes.summary: Trapped, Rick, Hershel and Glenn fight to survive against new foes, both dead and alive. Shane finds Lori in danger on the road and makes it his mission to bring her back to the farm.

episodes.name: 18 Miles Out
episodes.summary: Rick and Shane come into conflict over the fate of an outsider. Andrea helps Hershel's youngest daughter face a crucial decision.

episodes.name: Judge, Jury, Executioner
episodes.summary: Rick sides with Shane on an important decision, causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity. Carl's actions have unintended consequences on the group.

episodes.name: Better Angels
episodes.summary: The group learns that someone dangerous may be on the loose near the farm. As night falls, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn comb the woods to handle the situation and keep the group safe.

episodes.name: Beside the Dying Fire
episodes.summary: Rick and Carl return from the woods to find the farm in jeopardy. The group is split up in the ensuing chaos. With things looking grim, Rick’s leadership is questioned.

name: South Park
summary: South Park is an adult comedy animation show centred around 4 children in the small town of south park. Its humour is often dark involving satirical elements and mocking current real-life events.

episodes.name: Cartman Gets an Anal Probe
episodes.summary: Aliens wreak havoc in the Rockies, first by subjecting Cartman to an anal probe, and then by abducting Kyle's baby brother.

episodes.name: Weight Gain 4000
episodes.summary: Cartman tries to slim down when he learns a TV talk-show host is coming to town to give him an award, but he bulks up instead. Meanwhile, Mr. Garrison hatches a plan to murder the visiting celeb.

episodes.name: Volcano
episodes.summary: A volcanic eruption interrupts the boys' camping trip.

episodes.name: Big Gay Al's Big Gay Boat Ride
episodes.summary: When his pup explores his sexuality, Stan gets so upset that he inadvertently threatens to blow the school's homecoming-game victory.

episodes.name: An Elephant Makes Love to a Pig
episodes.summary: After a botched genetic experiment, Stan's clone is let loose in the town. Voices include Trey Parker and Matt Stone.

episodes.name: Death
episodes.summary: The boys summon the Grim Reaper.

episodes.name: Pinkeye
episodes.summary: A pinkeye epidemic interrupts the boys' plans to win a Halloween-costume contest; and Kenny has a run-in with a Russian space station when it falls to Earth.

episodes.name: Starvin' Marvin
episodes.summary: After the boys contact an agency that helps starving children, Government authorities send Cartman to Ethiopia. Meanwhile, the town holds a drive for canned goods; and turkeys revolt against a genetic engineer.

episodes.name: Mr. Hankey, the Christmas Poo
episodes.summary: Because he's Jewish, Kyle is denied involvement in the Nativity play and excluded from trips to see Santa. Meanwhile, South Park residents try to plan a politically correct celebration; and Mr. Hankey visits Kyle.

episodes.name: Damien
episodes.summary: As Cartman celebrates his birthday, Jesus Christ and Satan duke it out on a pay-per-view TV special. Meanwhile, Satan's son Damien tries to fit in with the crowd after making a violent first impression.

episodes.name: Tom's Rhinoplasty
episodes.summary: Mr. Garrison takes a leave of absence to have a nose job and is replaced by Miss Ellen, a substitute who threatens Stan and Wendy's relationship.

episodes.name: Mecha-Streisand
episodes.summary: The future of the world is at stake after the boys unearth a prehistoric relic that spawns a monster.

episodes.name: Cartman's Mom is a Dirty Slut
episodes.summary: When Cartman begins to exhibit odd behavior, a counselor suggests that finding his father may solve his problems.

episodes.name: Terrance & Phillip in "Not Without My Anus"
episodes.summary: An episode featuring Terrance and Phillip, who must save Canada from Saddam Hussein.

episodes.name: Cartman's Mom is Still a Dirty Slut
episodes.summary: Chef and the boys rush to the hospital to check on Mephesto, who's gunned down just as he's set to reveal the identity of Cartman's father. Meanwhile, the townspeople search for the gunman and battle a snowstorm.

episodes.name: Chickenlover
episodes.summary: The boys try to circumvent a delicate surgical procedure set to be performed on Kyle's brother as part of a tradition begun by their Jewish ancestors. Meanwhile, Mr. Mackey is cut from his job after he botches a lecture on drugs.

episodes.name: Ike's Wee Wee
episodes.summary: Chaos ensues on the streets of South Park as the town is overcome by a crime wave that leaves scores of chickens assaulted. And Officer Barbrady's no help...because he's resigned.

episodes.name: Conjoined Fetus Lady
episodes.summary: Kyle's terrified after an injury sustained during a dodgeball game sends him to the nurse---a conjoined twin with an unusual medical condition. Meanwhile, Pip leads the dodgeball team to the world championships in China.

episodes.name: The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka
episodes.summary: Jimbo and Ned launch a TV hunting show, which goes head-to-head with "Jesus and Pals," the popular cable-access series.

episodes.name: City on the Edge of Forever (a.k.a. Flashbacks)
episodes.summary: The boys put twists on events such as the attempted assassination of a talk-show host and a fight with Death as their bus hangs off a cliff. Meanwhile, Ms. Crabtree finds fame when she goes to look for help.

episodes.name: Summer Sucks
episodes.summary: The mayor devises a plan to make the town's Fourth of July celebration memorable, despite a ban on fireworks; and Mr. Hat vanishes, causing Mr. Garrison to visit a therapist.

episodes.name: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls
episodes.summary: Hollywood pooh-bahs in town for a film festival try to sign Mr. Hankey to a movie deal after their upscale cuisine disrupts the sewage system and nearly destroys him. Meanwhile, locals are up in arms over the movie-industry event.

episodes.name: Chickenpox
episodes.summary: The town faces an outbreak of chicken pox.

episodes.name: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods
episodes.summary: Stan, Kyle and Kenny gravitate toward a new planetarium; and Cartman auditions to be the star of "Les Miserables."

episodes.name: Clubhouses
episodes.summary: The boys each build a clubhouse---and Stan is eager to have Wendy over for a game of "truth or dare." However, his parents' separation interferes with his plans.

episodes.name: Cow Days
episodes.summary: During South Park's annual rodeo, the boys compete in a bull-riding contest. Meanwhile, the cows find religion.

episodes.name: Chef Aid
episodes.summary: Chef invites some of his well-known musician friends to participate in a benefit concert after he loses all of his money in a lawsuit. Meanwhile, the boys join the workforce to help him get out of debt.

episodes.name: Spooky Fish
episodes.summary: Stan fears his pet fish may be involved with a rash of unsolved murders that occur on Halloween. Meanwhile, Cartman starts killing people---with kindness, even going so far as to appreciate Wendy's liberal views.

episodes.name: Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!
episodes.summary: The boys go to Cartman's grandmother's house for a holiday feast that's also attended by Cartman's uncle (an escaped con) and the police.

episodes.name: Gnomes (a.k.a. Underpants Gnomes)
episodes.summary: The boys work on a project with a high-strung kid whose parents' coffee shop faces strong competition from a conglomerate that hopes to set up in South Park.

episodes.name: Prehistoric Ice Man
episodes.summary: The boys unearth a prehistoric man frozen in ice, but the discovery jeopardizes Stan and Kyle's friendship when they argue over what to name him.

name: Game of Thrones
summary: Based on the bestselling book series A Song of Ice and Fire by George R.R. Martin, this sprawling new HBO drama is set in a world where summers span decades and winters can last a lifetime. From the scheming south and the savage eastern lands, to the frozen north and ancient Wall that protects the realm from the mysterious darkness beyond, the powerful families of the Seven Kingdoms are locked in a battle for the Iron Throne. This is a story of duplicity and treachery, nobility and honor, conquest and triumph. In the Game of Thrones, you either win or you die.

episodes.name: Winter is Coming
episodes.summary: Lord Eddard Stark, ruler of the North, is summoned to court by his old friend, King Robert Baratheon, to serve as the King's Hand. Eddard reluctantly agrees after learning of a possible threat to the King's life. Eddard's bastard son Jon Snow must make a painful decision about his own future, while in the distant east Viserys Targaryen plots to reclaim his father's throne, usurped by Robert, by selling his sister in marriage.

episodes.name: The Kingsroad
episodes.summary: An incident on the Kingsroad threatens Eddard and Robert's friendship. Jon and Tyrion travel to the Wall, where they discover that the reality of the Night's Watch may not match the heroic image of it.

episodes.name: Lord Snow
episodes.summary: Jon Snow attempts to find his place amongst the Night's Watch. Eddard and his daughters arrive at King's Landing.

episodes.name: Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
episodes.summary: Tyrion stops at Winterfell on his way home and gets a frosty reception from Robb Stark. Eddard's investigation into the death of his predecessor gets underway.

episodes.name: The Wolf and the Lion
episodes.summary: Catelyn's actions on the road have repercussions for Eddard. Tyrion enjoys the dubious hospitality of the Eyrie.

episodes.name: A Golden Crown
episodes.summary: Viserys is increasingly frustrated by the lack of progress towards gaining his crown.

episodes.name: You Win or You Die
episodes.summary: Eddard's investigations in King's Landing reach a climax and a dark secret is revealed.

episodes.name: The Pointy End
episodes.summary: Tyrion joins his father's army with unexpected allies. Events in King's Landing take a turn for the worse as Arya's lessons are put to the test.

episodes.name: Baelor
episodes.summary: Catelyn must negotiate with the irascible Lord Walder Frey.

episodes.name: Fire and Blood
episodes.summary: Daenerys must realize her destiny. Jaime finds himself in an unfamiliar predicament.

episodes.name: The North Remembers
episodes.summary: War grips the continent of Westeros. As Tyrion Lannister tries to take his strong-willed nephew in hand in King's Landing, Stannis Baratheon launches his own campaign to take the Iron Throne with the help of a mysterious priestess. In the east, Daenerys must lead her retinue through a desolate wasteland whilst beyond the Wall the Night's Watch seeks the aid of a wildling.

episodes.name: The Night Lands
episodes.summary: Stannis uses Ser Davos to seek out new allies for his war with the Lannisters. On the road north, Arya confides in Gendry. Robb Stark sends Theon Greyjoy to win an alliance with his father and the fierce warriors of the Iron Islands. Cersei and Tyrion clash on how to rule in King's Landing.

episodes.name: What is Dead May Never Die
episodes.summary: Catelyn Stark treats with King Renly in the hope of winning an alliance. Tyrion undertakes a complex plan in King's Landing to expose an enemy. At Winterfell, Bran's dreams continue to trouble him.

episodes.name: Garden of Bones
episodes.summary: Tyrion attempts to restrain Joffrey's cruelty. Catelyn attempts to broker a peace between Stannis and Renly. Daenerys and her followers arrive at the great city of Qarth and hope to find refuge there. Arya and Gendry arrive at Harrenhal, a great castle now under Lannister occupation.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Harrenhal
episodes.summary: Confusion rages in the Stormlands in the wake of a devastating reversal. Catelyn must flee with a new ally, whilst Littlefinger sees an opportunity in the chaos. Theon seeks to prove himself to his father in battle. Arya receives a promise from the enigmatic Jaqen H'ghar. The Night's Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men. Daenerys Targaryen receives a marriage proposal.

episodes.name: The Old Gods and the New
episodes.summary: Arya has a surprise visitor; Dany vows to take what is hers; Joffrey meets his subjects; Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself.

episodes.name: A Man Without Honor
episodes.summary: Jaime meets a relative; Theon hunts; Dany receives an invitation.

episodes.name: The Prince of Winterfell
episodes.summary: Theon holds the fort; Arya calls in her debt with Jaqen; Robb is betrayed; Stannis and Davos approach their destination.

episodes.name: Blackwater
episodes.summary: A massive battle rages for control of King's Landing and the Iron Throne.

episodes.name: Valar Morghulis
episodes.summary: Tyrion awakens to a changed situation. King Joffrey doles out rewards to his subjects. As Theon stirs his men to action, Luwin offers some final advice. Brienne silences Jaime; Arya receives a gift from Jaqen; Dany goes to a strange place; Jon proves himself to Qhorin.

name: House of Cards
summary: Based on the BBC miniseries of the same name, House of Cards follows Francis Underwood, the politician's politician – masterful, beguiling, charismatic and ruthless. He and his equally ambitious wife Claire will stop at nothing to ensure their ascendancy. This wicked political drama slithers beneath the curtain and through the back halls of greed, sex, love and corruption in modern Washington D.C.

episodes.name: Chapter 1
episodes.summary: Allegiances are abandoned after a promise is broken in the opener of this drama, which follows a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife as they navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

episodes.name: Chapter 2
episodes.summary: Francis attacks the White House through the media; Claire makes a cruel decision.

episodes.name: Chapter 3
episodes.summary: Francis deals with a crisis in his home district; Zoe experiences the politics of journalism.

episodes.name: Chapter 4
episodes.summary: Francis takes on leaders in Congress; Peter Russo is forced to choose between politics and family.

episodes.name: Chapter 5
episodes.summary: Francis' fight over an education bill creates unfortunate side effects.

episodes.name: Chapter 6
episodes.summary: Francis battles striking teachers; Claire receives a surprise confession.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.summary: Francis wins a major victory; Peter faces his past; and Stamper attempts to bury a secret.

episodes.name: Chapter 8
episodes.summary: Francis receives an honor; Peter returns to Philadelphia.

episodes.name: Chapter 9
episodes.summary: Francis and Stamper seek support in Congress.

episodes.name: Chapter 10
episodes.summary: Claire defies Francis; Peter presents an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Chapter 11
episodes.summary: Peter battles personal demons; Francis enters dangerous territory.

episodes.name: Chapter 12
episodes.summary: Francis takes an unexpected detour.

episodes.name: Chapter 13
episodes.summary: Francis desperately tries to keep his plan on track in the Season 1 finale. Later, Claire suffers the consequences of her decisions.

episodes.name: Chapter 14
episodes.summary: The Underwoods face two threats in the Season 2 premiere. Later, Francis grooms his replacement; and Claire goes on the offensive.

episodes.name: Chapter 15
episodes.summary: Francis targets China. Meanwhile, Claire confronts a painful trauma from her past; and Lucas Goodwin presses for the truth.

episodes.name: Chapter 16
episodes.summary: Tensions rise between Francis and Raymond Tusk. Later, a battle in the Senate pits Francis against the Republicans.

episodes.name: Chapter 17
episodes.summary: A terror scare at the Capitol traps Francis with a resentful Donald Blythe. Meanwhile, Claire gives an attention-grabbing live interview.

episodes.name: Chapter 18
episodes.summary: Lucas goes to extreme measures to expose Francis.

episodes.name: Chapter 19
episodes.summary: Francis and Tusk end their alliance. Meanwhile, Lucas must make a difficult choice; and Stamper grows closer to Rachel.

episodes.name: Chapter 20
episodes.summary: The Walkers deepen their friendship with the Underwoods.

episodes.name: Chapter 21
episodes.summary: Claire influences Tricia Walker politically and domestically. Later, Francis has a showdown with Linda Vasquez.

episodes.name: Chapter 22
episodes.summary: Tusk blindsides the Underwoods.

episodes.name: Chapter 23
episodes.summary: Francis tries to finish off Tusk for good. Later, Claire and Jackie Sharp collide.

episodes.name: Chapter 24
episodes.summary: Francis is interrogated. Meanwhile, Stamper wrestles with personal demons.

episodes.name: Chapter 25
episodes.summary: Francis finds himself shut out. Later, Claire makes a difficult sacrifice; and Stamper tries to regain control.

episodes.name: Chapter 26
episodes.summary: Francis faces annihilation in the Season 2 finale. Meanwhile, Stamper ties up loose ends; and Claire feels the repercussions of ruthlessness.

name: The Big Bang Theory
summary: The Big Bang Theory is a comedy about brilliant physicists, Leonard and Sheldon, who are the kind of "beautiful minds" that understand how the universe works. But none of that genius helps them interact with people, especially women. All this begins to change when a free-spirited beauty named Penny moves in next door. Sheldon, Leonard's roommate, is quite content spending his nights playing Klingon Boggle with their socially dysfunctional friends, fellow Cal Tech scientists Wolowitz and Koothrappali. However, Leonard sees in Penny a whole new universe of possibilities... including love.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: Is a comedy about brilliant physicists, Leonard and Sheldon, who are the kind of "beautiful minds" that understand how the universe works. But none of that genius helps them interact with people, especially women. All this begins to change when a free-spirited beauty named Penny moves in next door. Sheldon, Leonard's roommate, is quite content spending his nights playing Klingon Boggle with their socially dysfunctional friends, fellow Cal Tech scientists Wolowitz and Koothrappali. However, Leonard sees in Penny a whole new universe of possibilities... including love.

episodes.name: The Big Bran Hypothesis
episodes.summary: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package, hoping to make a good impression on Penny. When he enlists the help of his obsessive-compulsive roommate, Sheldon, his attempt at chivalry goes horribly awry.

episodes.name: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
episodes.summary: Leonard is bummed to learn that his crush, Penny, is seeing someone, so encouraged by his friends and fellow scientists, Leonard actually summons the nerve to ask a woman out on a date.

episodes.name: The Luminous Fish Effect
episodes.summary: When Sheldon gets fired, he explores life beyond physics, but his initial thrill of shopping with Penny devolves over time to him weaving ponchos as a shut-in, forcing Leonard to call on Sheldon's mother.

episodes.name: The Hamburger Postulate
episodes.summary: After sensing his pursuit of Penny isn't going anywhere, Leonard agrees to an unexpected sexual encounter with fellow scientist Leslie Winkle.

episodes.name: The Middle-Earth Paradigm
episodes.summary: Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz and Koothrappali undertake a challenging and risky experiment-attending the Halloween party being thrown by their hot neighbor, Penny.

episodes.name: The Dumpling Paradox
episodes.summary: When Wolowitz seduces Penny's friend and takes over her apartment, Penny sleeps on Leonard and Sheldon's couch. With Wolowitz preoccupied, the guys discover they are without a fourth member of their group and in desperation, they ask Penny to join their Halo team.

episodes.name: The Grasshopper Experiment
episodes.summary: Koothrappali is overwhelmed after his parents arrange a blind date, but he discovers he actually can talk to the opposite sex after a few drinks; however, complications set in when his beautiful date is more interested in Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization
episodes.summary: When Sheldon and Leonard are invited to present their joint findings at a physics conference, Sheldon refuses, and Penny steps in to mediate, only deepening the rift between the two best friends.

episodes.name: The Loobenfeld Decay
episodes.summary: After hearing Penny sing, Leonard lies to avoid seeing her perform, but Sheldon takes it one step further with a more elaborate lie that leads to the appearance of his non-existent cousin.

episodes.name: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
episodes.summary: When Sheldon gets sick, Leonard and the boys know what's in store and avoid him like the plague, leaving an unsuspecting Penny to nurse the world's worst patient back to health.

episodes.name: The Jerusalem Duality
episodes.summary: When Leonard and Sheldon meet a 15-year-old physics prodigy, Sheldon is distraught that this boy genius is younger and smarter, so in an attempt to restore his sense of purpose, the boys come up with a solution to derail Dennis' research.

episodes.name: The Bat Jar Conjecture
episodes.summary: Since Sheldon's only focus is to prove his mental superiority while preparing for the Physics Bowl, the guys kick him off the team and enlist his nemesis Leslie Winkle.

episodes.name: The Nerdvana Annihilation
episodes.summary: When Leonard and the guys buy a time machine prop from a classic 1960 movie, its arrival creates problems for Penny and she tells the boys that their obsession with comics and toys is "pathetic".

episodes.name: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
episodes.summary: When Leonard, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali all become smitten with Sheldon's twin sister, Leonard devises a plan to eliminate his rivals, however, it backfires when Sheldon declares he will decide whom his sister dates.

episodes.name: The Peanut Reaction
episodes.summary: When Penny learns that Leonard doesn't celebrate birthdays, she attempts to throw him a surprise party, but is sidetracked by Sheldon who unexpectedly gets to live out one of his greatest fantasies at an electronics store.

episodes.name: The Tangerine Factor
episodes.summary: When Leonard asks Penny out on a date and she says yes, they each seek the "wisdom" of reluctant advisor.

episodes.name: The Bad Fish Paradigm
episodes.summary: After her first date with Leonard goes awry, Penny finds an unwilling confidant in Leonard's anti-social roommate, Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Codpiece Topology
episodes.summary: When Leonard sees Penny with a handsome new guy, he enters into a rebound relationship with Sheldon's nemesis, Leslie Winkle.

episodes.name: The Barbarian Sublimation
episodes.summary: Sheldon creates a monster when he introduces Penny to the world of online gaming.

episodes.name: The Griffin Equivalency
episodes.summary: Raj, newly famous because of an article in a magazine, gets a big head and makes a disastrous play for Leonard's crush, Penny.

episodes.name: The Euclid Alternative
episodes.summary: Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to make Sheldon confront his longstanding fear of driving.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem
episodes.summary: Young grad student's attraction to Sheldon confuses everyone, including Sheldon himself.

episodes.name: The Panty Piñata Polarization
episodes.summary: Penny vows to get revenge on Sheldon when he bans her from the apartment for a series of petty infractions.

episodes.name: The Lizard-Spock Expansion
episodes.summary: Wolowitz thinks he's found the love of his life, until she meets Leonard.

episodes.name: The White Asparagus Triangulation
episodes.summary: Sheldon can barely contain his joy when Leonard starts dating a woman who meets Sheldon's exacting standards.

episodes.name: The Vartabedian Conundrum
episodes.summary: When Leonard's relationship with a new woman starts moving too fast, he goes to Penny for advice.

name: Narcos
summary: Narcos chronicle the life and death of drug lord Pablo Escobar the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel and a known terrorist who was also a congressman, a family man and revered by the poor as a new Robin Hood.

episodes.name: Descenso
episodes.summary: A Chilean drugsproducer, the chemist Cockroach, brings his product to the Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA-Agent Steve Murphy is fighting drugs in Bogota.

episodes.name: The Sword of Simón Bolívar
episodes.summary: The communistic radical group M-19 are counteracting the drug lords and Murphy's new partner Peña teaches him the Colombian way of law enforcement.

episodes.name: The Men of Always
episodes.summary: Murphy is confronted with corruption in the Colombian government once he tries to discolate Escobar's his political ambition together with his partner Peña.

episodes.name: The Palace in Flames
episodes.summary: Despite a new extradition treaty, the USA is increasing their budget to fight communism. It will create new challenges for Murphy and Peña to hunt for Pablo Escobar.

episodes.name: There Will Be a Future
episodes.summary: Pablo's extreme methods is almost leading to a war between drug lords, Carillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness Elisa.

episodes.name: Explosivos
episodes.summary: Gacha was almost caught by Peña and Carillo. Murphy tries to protect candidate Gaviria against assassins with ties to Pablo as she is in favour for extradition.

episodes.name: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episodes.summary: Pablo went to hiding as political tides are turning against him, but he finds a way to beat back. The CIA is finally offering their help to Peña and Murphy.

episodes.name: La Gran Mentira
episodes.summary: A tragic mistake forces the government to change strategies to fight Pablo, but Pablo has bigger issues as there is danger from within his empire.

episodes.name: La Catedral
episodes.summary: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over once he signs a deal with the government, but Murphy, Peña and the Calicartel have different thoughts about that.

episodes.name: Despegue
episodes.summary: Pablo's activities in prison forces the government to use extreme actions. Murphy and Peña have to deal with a problematic situation.

episodes.name: Free at Last
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.

episodes.name: Cambalache
episodes.summary: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.

episodes.name: Our Man in Madrid
episodes.summary: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Dead
episodes.summary: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limon proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.

episodes.name: The Enemies of My Enemy
episodes.summary: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.

episodes.name: Los Pepes
episodes.summary: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.

episodes.name: Deutschland 93
episodes.summary: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.

episodes.name: Exit El Patrón
episodes.summary: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.

episodes.name: Nuestra Finca
episodes.summary: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.

episodes.name: Al Fin Cayó!
episodes.summary: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

name: Black Mirror
summary: Over the last ten years, technology has transformed almost every aspect of our lives before we've had time to stop and question it. In every home; on every desk; in every palm - a plasma screen; a monitor; a smartphone--a black mirror of our 21st Century existence. Black Mirror is a contemporary British re-working of The Twilight Zone with stories that tap into the collective unease about our modern world.

episodes.name: The National Anthem
episodes.summary: Prime Minister Michael Callow faces a huge and shocking dilemma when Princess Susannah, a much-loved member of the Royal Family, is kidnapped.

episodes.name: Fifteen Million Merits
episodes.summary: In the near future, everyone is confined to a life of strange physical drudgery. The only way to escape is to enter the 'Hot Shot' talent show and pray you can impress the judges.

episodes.name: The Entire History of You
episodes.summary: A jealous husband, Liam Foxwell, suspects that his wife was involved with another man. Thanks to an implant that lets anyone play memories back as long and as often as they want, he sets out to confirm his suspicions.

episodes.name: Be Right Back
episodes.summary: When a man named Ash dies, his girlfriend Martha is grief-stricken... until a friend directs her to a service that can create an AI programmed with Ash's online personality. Eventually the software offers Martha a new improvement: a physical body for it to occupy.

episodes.name: White Bear
episodes.summary: A woman, Victoria, wakes up with amnesia and a fellow survivor tells her that nine-tenths of the world's population have been turned into photo-taking zombies by a mysterious TV signal. To get to safety, they have to evade the sadistic hunters and destroy the White Bear transmitter. However, Victoria soon realizes that something far more sinister is going on.

episodes.name: The Waldo Moment
episodes.summary: An animated blue bear, Waldo, proves surprisingly successful as a third-party candidate. But Jamie Salter, the voice of Waldo, begins to have second thoughts when he learns what the governments of the world intend to use Waldo for.

episodes.name: Nosedive
episodes.summary: In the near future, everyone is obsessed with getting ratings from others... and a woman, Lacie, is determined to get a high enough rating to buy the home she's always dreamed of.

episodes.name: Playtest
episodes.summary: An American, Cooper, leaves the States to avoid facing his mother after the death of his father. Trying to raise money, he signs up to playtest a new VR game for a cutting-edge company and gets more than he expected.

episodes.name: Shut Up and Dance
episodes.summary: Hackers get a compromising video of a teenager, Kenny, and force him and their other blackmail victims to complete an elaborate and increasingly dangerous series of tasks.

episodes.name: San Junipero
episodes.summary: A woman named Yorkie arrives in the 1987 town of San Junipero, and soon links up with the free-spirited Kelly. But San Junipero isn't all that it seems...

episodes.name: Men Against Fire
episodes.summary: A soldier, Stripe, serves in Europe hunting down mutated humans known as "Roaches." However, he soon discovers that the creatures aren't what they appear.

episodes.name: Hated in the Nation
episodes.summary: A DIC and her new shadow investigate a reporter's death and discover that she was the most hated woman in the UK by popular vote... and the vote killed her.

episodes.name: USS Callister
episodes.summary: A new recruit aboard the Space Fleet cruiser USS Callister soon discovers that she's not real... and neither is anything else.

episodes.name: Arkangel
episodes.summary: An overprotective mother has a chip installed in her daughter's head that lets her monitor everything she sees and hears, but takes it too far.

episodes.name: Crocodile
episodes.summary: An old friend of architect Mia Nolan tells her that he's going to confess to a crime that they both commited 15 years ago. Mia is forced to silence him and then anyone who might tie her to the crime.

episodes.name: Hang the DJ
episodes.summary: A mysterious "System" pairs up couples and sets expiry dates on their relationships, but one couple decides to rebel.

episodes.name: Metalhead
episodes.summary: In a post-apocalyptic England, three scavengers break into a warehouse. Two of them are killed by a robot "dog" drone, which relentlessly hunts the survivor.

episodes.name: Black Museum
episodes.summary: A woman, Nish, stops at Rolo Haynes' World Famous Black Museum, and Rolo is glad to show her the technological crime oddities that he's collected.

episodes.name: Striking Vipers
episodes.summary: Karl invites his old college friend Danny to join him in a VR fighting game, and Danny soon finds himself questioning his values and his relationship with his wife.

episodes.name: Smithereens
episodes.summary: A former IT teacher takes an employee of the tech company Smithereen hostage and demands to speak to the company's owner... or he'll kill his captive.

episodes.name: Rachel, Jack and Ashley, Too
episodes.summary: Pop star Ashley O's controlling manager, her aunt Catherine, puts Ashley into a coma and mines her brain for new songs. It's up to two plucky teenagers and a download of Ashley's brain to stop Catherine.

name: Stranger Things
summary: A love letter to the '80s classics that captivated a generation, Stranger Things is set in 1983 Indiana, where a young boy vanishes into thin air. As friends, family and local police search for answers, they are drawn into an extraordinary mystery involving top-secret government experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one very strange little girl.

episodes.name: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.summary: A young boy mysteriously disappears, and his panicked mother demands that the police find him. Meanwhile, the boy's friends conduct their own search, and meet a mysterious girl in the forest.

episodes.name: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.summary: While the search for the missing Will continues, Joyce tells Jim about a call she apparently received from her son. Meanwhile, Jane warns Mike that there are bad people after her, and he realizes that she knows what happened to Will.

episodes.name: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.summary: While Nancy looks for a missing Barbara and realizes that Jonathan may have been the last person to see her, Mike and his friends go out with Jane to find the missing Will. Meanwhile, Jim tracks Will to the lab.

episodes.name: Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.summary: Jim realizes that the government is covering something up about Will's death and begins a personal investigation. Meanwhile, Nancy discovers that Jonathan has information about Barbara's disappearance, while Mike and his friends smuggle Jane into the school so she can use the ham radio to contact Will.

episodes.name: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.summary: Jim searches for Will at Hawkins Laboratory, but finds something unexpected. Meanwhile, Lonnie helps Joyce bury Will but reveals an ulterior motive for returning to town, while the boys find a way to locate Will but discover that Jane is opposing them.

episodes.name: Chapter Six: The Monster
episodes.summary: Jonathan manages to pull Nancy back to the real world from the Upside Down. Meanwhile, Lucas refuses to help with the search for Jane and goes to Hawkins Labs on his own, while Dustin and Mike look for the missing girl.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
episodes.summary: Jim manages to bring everyone together so that they can join forces to reconnect Jane to the Upside Down and find Will. Meanwhile, the government closes in on Jane and the boys.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
episodes.summary: Jim convinces Brenner to let him and Joyce enter the Upside Down to find Will... unaware that Brenner plans to recover Jane no matter what it takes. Meanwhile, Nancy and Jonathan prepare to trap the monster at the Byers house, but receive an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.summary: One year after the events with the Upside Down and the Demogorgon, Will meets with a government doctor. The boys discover that there's a new player in town, and Jim pays a visit to El.

episodes.name: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.summary: The boys go trick-or-treating on Halloween, and Will has another vision. Meanwhile, El relieves the days following her escape from the Upside Down, and Dustin finds something in the garbage can.

episodes.name: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
episodes.summary: Dustin takes in a stray and calls it D'Artagnan. However, his plans to show it to Mr. Clarke don't go as intended. Meanwhile, Max tries to convince Mike to let her join the group, El sneaks out to pay her friends a visit, and Will decides to take a stand and face his fears.

episodes.name: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
episodes.summary: After his encounter with the shadow creature, Will's condition worsens. Meanwhile, Jim and El fight after Jim discovers that El disobeyed the rules, and Owens brings Nancy and Jonathan to Hawkins Labs for a chat.

episodes.name: Chapter Five: Dig Dug
episodes.summary: Jim is trapped in the Upside Down, and Joyce enlists Bob to help find him. Meanwhile, Nancy and Jonathan go to Murray, and El learns about the circumstances surrounding her birth.

episodes.name: Chapter Six: The Spy
episodes.summary: Owens and his team try to find a way to end the shadow creature's influence on Will. Meanwhile, Dustin and Lucas find unlikely allies in their quest to find Dart.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven: The Lost Sister
episodes.summary: El travels to Chicago to find her sister Eight, aka Kali, who has teamed up with other outcasts to kill the men who tormented her at Hawkins Labs.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight: The Mind Flayer
episodes.summary: When the demo-dogs overrun Hawkins Labs, one of the group saves the others at the cost of their own life. When the others get back to the Byers house, they realize what they're facing and try to get answers from a captive Will.

episodes.name: Chapter Nine: The Gate
episodes.summary: The group splits up to close the gate, evict the Mind Flayer from Will, and drive the demo-dogs away from Hawkins Lab.

name: Rick and Morty
summary: Rick is a mentally gifted, but sociopathic and alcoholic scientist and a grandfather to Morty; an awkward, impressionable, and somewhat spineless teenage boy. Rick moves into the family home of Morty, where he immediately becomes a bad influence.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: Rick takes Morty to another dimension to get some seeds for him but Morty's parents are considering to put Rick in a retirement home for keeping Morty away from school to help him in his lab.

episodes.name: Lawnmower Dog
episodes.summary: Morty's small, white dog Snuffles gets on the nerves of the family, so Rick quickly builds a knowledge enhancing helmet for the dog. In the meantime, Rick and Morty decide to incept the dreams of Morty's math teacher, Mr. Goldenfold in order to convince him to give Morty A's in math. While the duo are sent on an epic dream world journey, Snuffles slowly gains sentience, which leads to a slew of even more problems.

episodes.name: Anatomy Park
episodes.summary: It's around Christmas time and Jerry's parents are coming to visit so he wants everybody to have a normal holiday without technology and without Rick. Fortunately for him, Rick has other plans, involving building a molecular theme park inside of a friend of his named Ruben, and he shrinks down Morty and sends him in there to test it out.

episodes.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery in this M. Night Shyamalan style twistaroony of an episode.

episodes.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
episodes.summary: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty. Sounds good, better record this one, broh!

episodes.name: Rick Potion #9
episodes.summary: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get Jessica. The serum backfires & Rick's attempt to fix things creates Cronenberg inspired monsters. Rick is okay with it but Morty feels partly responsible for creating a living nightmare.

episodes.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
episodes.summary: Morty convinces Rick to buy him a sexy robot. Guess what tho? Trouble happens, dog.

episodes.name: Rixty Minutes
episodes.summary: When Rick hooks up the family's tv receiver with reality-tv shows from alternate dimensions, and allows them to see themselves in different versions of their lives, they begin to wonder what they have, and more importantly - what could have been.

episodes.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
episodes.summary: Rick goes to battle with the devil, and Summer gets upset about it, broh. Plus Jerry and Morty hang out, broh!

episodes.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
episodes.summary: Rick has a run in with some old associates, resulting in a fallout with Morty. You got any chips, broh?

episodes.name: Ricksy Business
episodes.summary: Beth and Jerry head for an iceberg of a date leaving Rick in charge. Morty doesn't get to go on any more adventures if the house isn't in the same condition when they get back.

episodes.name: A Rickle in Time
episodes.summary: Rick don goofed this time and mussed up the whole time frame broh! Beth and Jerry get romantic!

episodes.name: Mortynight Run
episodes.summary: Morty tries to save a life.

episodes.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
episodes.summary: Rick becomes emotional; Beth and Jerry are hard on each other.

episodes.name: Total Rickall
episodes.summary: Meeting new friends; Morty goes ballistic.

episodes.name: Get Schwifty
episodes.summary: Rick and Morty must step up and save things; a new religion starts up.

episodes.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
episodes.summary: Rick forgets to check his oil, and must repair his car.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
episodes.summary: Rick joins in on hijinks, Beth and Jerry sort out relationship issues.

episodes.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
episodes.summary: Jerry gets sick and Rick sparks up the TV.

episodes.name: Look Who's Purging Now
episodes.summary: Morty makes a mistake and Jerry and Summer work on their father daughter relationship.

episodes.name: The Wedding Squanchers
episodes.summary: Birdperson is getting married and invites the Smith family to the wedding.

name: Westworld
summary: Westworld is a dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin. Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, it explores a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged.

episodes.name: The Original
episodes.summary: A woman named Dolores is a free spirit in the Old West... and unaware that she's actually an android, programmed to entertain rich guests seeking to act out their fantasies in an idealized vision of the 1880s. However, the people in charge soon realize that their androids are acting in ways that they didn't anticipate.

episodes.name: Chestnut
episodes.summary: Bernard suspects that someone is sabotaging the hosts. Meanwhile, the Man continues his search for the deeper game, and Maeve finds herself in a world of hurt... literally.

episodes.name: The Stray
episodes.summary: Bernard continues to investigate Dolores' supposed malfunction, and realizes that he has something unexpected on his hands. Meanwhile, Robert talks about the early days of the park, and Teddy receives a new role and narrative.

episodes.name: Dissonance Theory
episodes.summary: While Dolores joins William and Logan on their adventure, the Man in Black continues his search for the entrance to the Maze and meets Armistice. Meanwhile, Robert reveals some of his true power to Theresa and advises her to stay out of his way.

episodes.name: Contrapasso
episodes.summary: Dolores takes the first step on her path of discovery by deciding to write a new story for herself... where she isn't the damsel. Meanwhile, Elise discovers the Woodcutter's secret, and Robert pays the Man a visit.

episodes.name: The Adversary
episodes.summary: While Maeve convinces Felix to show her "upstairs," Teddy and the Man close in on the maze. Meanwhile, Bernard and Elsie close in on the identity of the person who is stealing secrets from the park, while Lee meets with a Delos executive director.

episodes.name: Trompe L'Oeil
episodes.summary: While William and Dolores travel to the unclaimed territories, Charlotte and Theresa make plans to force Robert out of the park using Clementine. Meanwhile, Maeve continues her plans to escape Westworld.

episodes.name: Trace Decay
episodes.summary: Bernard tries to cope with what he did under Robert's orders. Meanwhile, William and Dolores find a town, and Maeve remembers more of her past. Meanwhile, the Man reveals his past to Teddy.

episodes.name: The Well-Tempered Clavier
episodes.summary: Bernard forces Robert to take him back into his own memories, while the Man meets with Charlotte. Meanwhile, Dolores escapes the Confederado camp and William gives Logan new orders.

episodes.name: The Bicameral Mind
episodes.summary: Delores finds out the truth about William's fate. Meanwhile, Maeve organizes an escape plan, only to discover that someone else is pulling the strings. And Robert plays the final piece in his grand narrative.

episodes.name: Journey Into Night
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of the host rebellion, the rescue team finds Bernard and the new Head of Operations asks for his help. Meanwhile, Delores promises to show Teddy the truth, and Maeve convinces Lee and Hector to help her find her daughter.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.summary: Dolores looks for allies sympathetic to her cause and shows Teddy the truth of his existence. In the past, Dolores gets her first taste of the outside world and William shows her a weapon of mass destruction.

episodes.name: Virtù e Fortuna
episodes.summary: While Delores makes a deal with the Confederados, Maeve and her group find Felix and Sylvester. Meanwhile, a new Guest comes to Westworld, and Bernard has a meeting of minds with Peter.

episodes.name: The Riddle of the Sphinx
episodes.summary: William pays his recuperating father-in-law several visits. Meanwhile, the Man continues to play Robert's game, and Bernard remembers some of his missing time.

episodes.name: Akane No Mai
episodes.summary: While Maeve and her people explore Shogun World, Delores realizes that the Teddy she knows can't be a part of the new world coming.

episodes.name: Phase Space
episodes.summary: Maeve finds her daughter, Delores finds the "real" Teddy, Grace finds her father, and Charlotte and Stubbs find Peter.

episodes.name: Les Écorchés
episodes.summary: Charlotte and Bernard review Bernard's memories to discover what happened to the missing control unit. Meanwhile, Robert has a chat with Bernard, and Maeve confronts her former tormentor.

episodes.name: Kiksuya
episodes.summary: Another of Westworld's Host revolutionaries is revealed. Meanwhile, Emily finds the Man and convinces the Ghost Nation to hand him over to her to ensure his suffering.

episodes.name: Vanishing Point
episodes.summary: The Man learns that his grip on reality isn't what he thought, as he considers how his wife died. Meanwhile, Dolores continues her trek across the park to the Valley Beyond, and Bernard receives another visit from Robert.

episodes.name: The Passenger
episodes.summary: The Man faces a personal reckoning, while Akecheta and the others find the door. Meanwhile, Bernard meets with Robert one last time after choosing how to deal with Dolores.

episodes.name: Parce Domine
episodes.summary: If you're stuck in a loop, try walking in a straight line.

episodes.name: The Winter Line
episodes.summary: People put up a lot of walls. Bring a sledgehammer to your life.

episodes.name: The Absence of Field
episodes.summary: If you don't like what you see in the mirror, don't blame the mirror.

episodes.name: The Mother of Exiles
episodes.summary: The truth doesn't always set you free.

episodes.name: Genre
episodes.summary: Just say no.

episodes.name: Decoherence
episodes.summary: Do a lot of people tell you that you need therapy?

episodes.name: Passed Pawn
episodes.summary: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

episodes.name: Crisis Theory
episodes.summary: Time to face the music.
